@taxevader calm down the reason why NTR is so popular in Japan is cuz of the country's conservative culture. Marriage in Japan is huge fucking deal and you can shunned to all hell if ppl aware ones infidelity. So that makes cheating taboo even more so than it is in the west. I mean even if a widow/widower falls for another person it is still seen as cheating in their eyes. So because of all those factors NTR always sells a but ton. So easy with obnoxious presumptions lol. Also @Katzu_Official I'm not a big NTR fan I just read them mostly for the art and even I know that claim is bull  in Japan NTR is really popular for the reasons I've stared above, lol.

@Katzu_Official The Japanese love it. Most of them are sexless losers with no hope of getting laid outside of paying so its understandable that they would enjoy a relatable self insert of a beta male being cucked. Its either denial (escapism) with isekai and harems or acceptance with NTR and cucks.

In Eightman's case, he was going to draw the girl doing the ntr but for some reason came back around to basic ntr because it's more "impactful" xddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd.

The afterword only drives it home how Eightman actually cares. The guy feels inferior to others and compares himself to artists that are just starting out and already seem much better than him. On the flip side, that's exactly what makes him put in the effort to improve his craft and create things that he can be proud of, because in the long run that's the only thing that will make an artist feel accomplished. I just gained a lot of respect for Eightman, and I wish I spoke Japanese so I could express my appreciation. You can call it unoriginal just because there's a girl getting stolen yada yada and all that, but this is way more original than 99% of the NTR out there.
@jeonsann Typical gaslighting to make her believe she's actually the mother.

Eightman is one of the few authors who actually care about their NTR stories. I might not like all of them, but this one is his best NTR work BY FAR. The art, presentation, story, everything hits the mark flawlessly. Sure, it's pretty nonsensical how Ichika still goes after Kotarou despite clearly choosing the old man, but that was just a way of delivering that "as a mother" in the end, which was great. It just baffles me how this doujin didn't even make it to the popular page and still only has 4k favorites right now. You retards love to push lazy and edgy NTR to the popular page while stuff like this is cast aside.
